title: 2021 ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships
description:
The 2021 ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships are taking place from 22 to 26 September 2021 in Bratislava, Slovakia under the auspices of International Canoe Federation (ICF). It is the 41st edition. The events are taking place at the Čunovo Water Sports Centre which was reconstructed before the championships. Bratislava is hosting the championships for the second time after previously hosting in 2011.
Bratislava is also hosting the 2021 Wildwater Canoeing World Championships as part of the same event.
